thread.title: Monique Frichot
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Monique Frichot

author: Monique Frichot
title: Monique Frichot
text: When I saw KISA on Shark Tank I immediately saw the benefits of the phone for my adult daughter who has an intellectual disability. I bought a phone straight away. It has been very successful for both of us. My daughter can use the phone independently and it has opened up a whole new world for her.
